data.comment: The match is underway at Allianz Rivera.
The match is underway at Allianz Rivera.
Free kick Nice.
Amaury Delerue awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Monaco.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monaco's Cesc Fabregas breaks free at Allianz Rivera. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of Nice.
Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Monaco's Stevan Jovetic misses with an attempt on goal.
Nice have a goal kick.
Throw-in Nice.
Amaury Delerue signals a Monaco throw-in in Nice's half.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Monaco.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Alexis Claude-Maurice (Nice) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Goal kick for Monaco at Allianz Rivera.
Monaco are coming forward and Ruben Aguilar gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Amaury Delerue awards Nice a goal kick.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nice have a goal kick.
Throw-in Nice.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Aleksandr Golovin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Monaco.
Monaco needs to be cautious. Nice have an attacking throw-in.
Can Monaco capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nice's half?
Monaco's Tiemoue Bakayoko gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Rivera. But the effort is unsuccessful.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nice close to the penalty box.
Monaco's Kamil Glik has been booked in Nice.
Important block from the Monaco defence as Danilo fires in a strike for Nice.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Nice, Aleksandr Golovin of Monaco is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Tiemoue Bakayoko (Monaco) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Wissam Ben Yedder.
Tiemoue Bakayoko instrumental with a fine assist.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Tiemoue Bakayoko.
Monacoâ€™s Tiemoue Bakayoko is on his feet again at Allianz Rivera.
Great shot from Monaco's Stevan Jovetic but he is denied by the crossbar.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Nice to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Monaco drive upfield and Wissam Ben Yedder gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nice defender.
Adam Ounas for Nice gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
Amaury Delerue awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Amaury Delerue awards Monaco a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Monaco.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monaco will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Nice.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Nice.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
Alexis Claude-Maurice of Nice smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Allianz Rivera, Danilo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Monaco's Wissam Ben Yedder gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In Nice Monaco attack through Youssouf Fofana. The finish is off target, however.
Nice have a goal kick.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Nice.
Christophe Herelle is on a sub for Riza Durmisi for Nice.
In Nice Nice attack through [49]. The finish is off target, however.
Amaury Delerue awards Monaco a goal kick.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Goal! Kasper Dolberg (Nice) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Great play from Adam Ounas to set up the goal.
Nice push upfield but Amaury Delerue quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Nice pushes forward through Pierre Lees-Melou, whose finish on goal is saved.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kasper Dolberg of Nice gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Nice.
Free kick Nice.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Monaco make their first substitution with Islam Slimani replacing Cesc Fabregas.
Cesc Fabregas is booked for the away team.
Throw-in Monaco.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
Amaury Delerue signals a Monaco throw-in in Nice's half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Nice to check on Adam Ounas, who is grimacing with pain.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
The home team has substituted Adam Ounas with Myziane Maolida. Patrick Vieira is thus making his second change.
Nice push forward at Allianz Rivera and Pierre Lees-Melou gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Monaco defence.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Islam Slimani (Monaco) has received a yellow card from Amaury Delerue.
Monaco drives forward and Tiemoue Bakayoko gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Amaury Delerue awards Nice a goal kick.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Ignatius Kpene Ganago is replacing Arnaud Lusamba for the home team.
Stevan Jovetic Monaco.
Nice to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Aleksandr Golovin hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Monaco.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Amaury Delerue will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Free kick Monaco.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Monaco.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
Goal! Kasper Dolberg gives Nice a 2-1 lead.
